title: Tech Mahindra Q4 profit surges 39% YoY to Rs 1,506 cr - Economic Times
content: Tech Mahindra Q4 profit surges 39% YoY to Rs 1,506 cr  Economic Times
description: NEW DELHI: IT major Tech Mahindra (TechM) on Friday said its profit after tax (PAT) for the quarter-ended March 2022 stood at Rs 1,506 crore, up 39.2 per cent over Rs 1,081 crore it reported in the same quarter last year.
